contact_message: Have questions? We love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
course_description: Explore a wide range of specialized training courses in the field of logistics and supply chain management.
last_news_description: Stay updated with our latest announcements, achievements, and industry insights.
Decleartion: Who is the Jordanian Logistics Union
decleartion_paragraph1: The Jordanian Logistics Union is a non-governmental organization specializing in providing logistics services in the region. We aim to facilitate the supply process and improve the customer experience.
decleartion_paragraph2: Since the establishment of the union, there has been continuous support and backing from official and public entities, as well as the International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations (FIATA).
decleartion_paragraph3: The Jordanian Logistics Union is part of a larger regional logistics organization in Jordan, which is a non-governmental organization focused on logistics services in the region. We aim to simplify the supply process and enhance customer satisfaction.
vision_description: To be the leading logistics union in Jordan, known for its excellence in service delivery and customer satisfaction.
mission_description: To develop and enhance the services provided to freight forwarders (land, sea, air) and logistics service providers in support of the national economy.
values_description: We are committed to providing high-quality logistics services that meet the needs of our customers. We strive to exceed expectations and build long-term relationships with our partners.

slider.slide0_description: We strive to advance the shipping industry in Jordan

slide1_description: Discover amazing solutions for your business needs
slide2_description: We leading the way with cutting-edge technology
slide3_description: We are committed to providing top-notch service that exceeds customer expectations.
footer.footer: Advancing Jordan's logistics sector through professional development, industry standards, and collaborative partnerships.
To advance the logistics industry in Jor: الارتقاء بقطاع الخدمات اللوجستية في الأردن من خلال التطوير المهني والمعايير الصناعية والشراكات التعاونية التي تعزز النمو الاقتصادي.
To position Jordan as the leading logist: تسعى إلى جعل الأردن مركزًا لوجستيًا رائدًا في الشرق الأوسط، يربط القارات ويسهّل التجارة العالمية.

missions.title: Our Mission
missions.description: To advance the logistics industry in Jordan through professional development, industry standards, and collaborative partnerships that drive economic growth.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To position Jordan as the leading logistics hub in the Middle East, connecting continents and facilitating global trade.

value.title: Our Values
value.description: Excellence, integrity, innovation, and collaboration guide everything we do as we serve our members and the logistics community.

fiata.title: FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding
fiata.description: The Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA) offers the globally recognized FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding, the world's leading qualification for logistics and transport professionals.
fiata.programOverview: This internationally recognized diploma equips aspiring and current professionals with the critical knowledge and practical skills needed to thrive in the global transport and logistics industry. Aligned with FIATA standards and structured around comprehensive modules, the program enables participants to master freight forwarding operations, understand international transport systems, navigate global regulations, and develop pricing and operational efficiency skills.

all_news.no_results_message: We couldn't find any news matching your search. Try different keywords.

about_milestones.milestone_2009_description: Established to unite Jordan's logistics professionals
about_milestones.milestone_2018_description: Expanded cooperation across the Middle East

home.slide1_title: JLA FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding – Delivered in Jordan
home.slide1_text: Enroll in a world-class FIATA-accredited diploma program with the Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA) and take your freight forwarding career to the next level.
home.slide2_text: Earn an internationally recognised diploma that meets FIATA's minimum standards for freight forwarding education and opens doors to global career opportunities.
home.slide3_text: Train with highly experienced logistics and freight forwarding professionals validated by FIATA and active in the industry.
home.welcome_title: Welcome to FIATA–JLA Diploma Hub in Jordan
home.welcome_text: Welcome to the official information hub for FIATA Diploma Programs delivered in Jordan by the Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA). Through FIATA-accredited training, logistics professionals and aspiring specialists can gain internationally recognised qualifications in freight forwarding and supply chain management.
home.card1_text: A comprehensive program covering multimodal transport, customs, digital operations, and global freight forwarding practices.
home.card2_text: The Jordanian Logistics Association is the official FIATA Association Member in Jordan, accredited to deliver FIATA Diploma training.
home.card3_text: Build your skills, expand your professional network, and align with the standards recognised by logistics companies around the world.
home.insights_text: Stay informed about the latest developments in freight forwarding and logistics worldwide.
home.insights_magazine_title: Check out the latest FIATA Association Magazine:

diplomaDetails.hero_description: Enroll in the JLA FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding and take your logistics career to the next level. Earn global recognition, build your professional network, and develop the skills needed in today's competitive logistics industry.
diplomaDetails.program_overview_p1: The International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations (FIATA), based in Zurich, Switzerland, is the global umbrella body for the freight forwarding industry. FIATA's commitment to excellence in education is embodied in its Advisory Body Vocational Training (ABVT), which has established comprehensive standards for awarding the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding.
diplomaDetails.program_overview_p2: The FIATA Diploma is an internationally recognised qualification covering the core principles of freight forwarding and international supply chains. Since its launch in 1996, it has become a benchmark of professional competence for freight forwarding operations worldwide.
diplomaDetails.application_form_title: Application Form – FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding
diplomaDetails.application_form_text: Please complete the form and email it to:
diplomaDetails.learning_objectives_intro: This internationally recognised Diploma in Freight Forwarding aims to equip aspiring and current professionals with the knowledge and practical skills required to:
diplomaDetails.objective1: Gain foundational knowledge of freight forwarding and global logistics
diplomaDetails.objective2: Understand international transport systems including sea, air, road, and rail
diplomaDetails.objective3: Navigate global regulations, customs procedures, and legal frameworks
diplomaDetails.objective4: Master essential transport documentation and FIATA documents
diplomaDetails.objective5: Develop pricing and cost estimation skills for freight modes
diplomaDetails.objective6: Boost operational efficiency through logistics planning
diplomaDetails.objective7: Apply principles of risk management and insurance
diplomaDetails.objective8: Handle dangerous goods in accordance with safety standards
diplomaDetails.objective9: Adopt digital tools such as barcoding and e-commerce platforms
diplomaDetails.objective10: Integrate sustainability practices and meet emissions standards
diplomaDetails.objective11: Gain real-world experience through applied case studies
diplomaDetails.objective12: Enhance career potential with globally recognized qualifications
diplomaDetails.curriculum_p1: The programme combines rigorous training with a focus on global trade practices, customs regulations, and supply chain optimisation. The training methodology balances traditional theoretical classes with case studies and practical assignments.
diplomaDetails.curriculum_p2: The programme is delivered by FIATA-validated instructors and industry experts using FIATA-approved training materials to ensure high-quality content.
diplomaDetails.topic1: Introduction to Freight Forwarding and Logistics Services
diplomaDetails.topic2: Land, Sea, Air, and Rail Transportation
diplomaDetails.topic3: Supply Chain Management and Logistics Services
diplomaDetails.curriculum_note: Note: A detailed module description is available in the Applicant Brochure.
diplomaDetails.target1: Fresh graduates seeking to enter the logistics sector
diplomaDetails.target3: Customs clearance officers and transport officials
diplomaDetails.target4: Owners and managers of SMEs in the logistics sector
diplomaDetails.selection_criteria_text: The Selection Committee reserves the right to interview candidates to validate the coherence of their professional background, qualifications, and motivation for pursuing the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding. This ensures that applicants' profiles align with the programme's Selection Criteria and objectives.
diplomaDetails.fee4: Daily refreshments during the training course
diplomaDetails.fees_flexible: Flexible payment options are available, allowing participants to pay in installments.
diplomaDetails.fees_discounts: Special discounts are available for group enrollments and Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA) members.
diplomaDetails.fees_contact: To learn more about programme fees, discounts, and installment plans, please contact JLA:
diplomaDetails.certification_intro: Graduates will receive a FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding signed by the FIATA President and FIATA Director General, including:
diplomaDetails.cta_description: Take the next step in your logistics career with the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding.

aboutFiata.hero_subtitle: International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations
aboutFiata.what_is_fiata_p1: FIATA, the International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations, is a non-governmental, membership-based organisation. FIATA represents the interests of freight forwarders worldwide by actively engaging with the World Trade Organization, United Nations agencies, international transport organisations, global partners, and governments to promote and protect the freight forwarding and logistics industry.
aboutFiata.what_is_fiata_p2: FIATA serves as a reference source on international policies and regulations governing the freight forwarding and logistics sector. It represents service providers in trade logistics and supply chain management. Through FIATA documents and forms, digitalisation of key trade documents, its annual congress and headquarters meetings, training programmes, and publications, FIATA promotes trade facilitation and best practices across the freight forwarding community.
aboutFiata.objective1: Unite the freight forwarding industry worldwide
aboutFiata.objective2: Represent, promote, and protect the interests of the industry by participating as advisors or experts in international transport-related meetings
aboutFiata.objective3: Familiarise trade, industry, and the public with the services provided by freight forwarders through information and publications
aboutFiata.objective4: Standardise and improve the quality of services delivered by freight forwarders by developing and promoting uniform forwarding documents and standard trading conditions
aboutFiata.objective5: Assist with vocational training, liability insurance, and tools for electronic commerce such as EDI and barcodes
aboutFiata.fli_intro: Training and education activities at FIATA take place under the FIATA Logistics Institute (FLI). FLI equips the logistics workforce with the skills and competences needed through initiatives such as:
aboutFiata.fli_initiative2: ICAO–FIATA Dangerous Goods by Air Training Programme
aboutFiata.membership_text: Individual Members are forwarding and logistics companies and other legal entities closely associated with the logistics sector. Joining FIATA as an Individual Member is a voluntary decision that reflects a commitment to FIATA's objectives, rules, and Business Integrity Statement. Many members join to benefit from the strong reputation and protection of the FIATA brand.

diplomaPrograms.main_intro: FIATA has developed minimum standards for professional education in freight forwarding and supply chain management. Based on these standards, there are two main FIATA diploma types.
diplomaPrograms.diploma1_delivered: Delivered by JLA - FIATA Association Member
diplomaPrograms.diploma2_title: FIATA Higher Diploma in Supply Chain Management
diplomaPrograms.training_p1: In Jordan, the Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA) is accredited to deliver the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding, with the potential to grow into further FIATA-aligned programs in the future.
diplomaPrograms.training_p2: This accreditation ensures that the training meets FIATA's rigorous international standards and provides participants with globally recognized qualifications that open doors to career opportunities worldwide.
diplomaPrograms.cta_title: Ready to Start Your FIATA Journey?
diplomaPrograms.cta_description: Explore the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding and take the first step toward international recognition.

jlaMember.about_p1: The Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA) was established in October 2007 to represent the freight forwarding industry in Jordan. Although freight forwarders play a significant role in the transportation sector, there was previously no dedicated official body acting as their spokesman with the government, transport users, and related organisations.
jlaMember.about_p2: Since its inception, JLA has received continuous support and recognition from Jordan's Ministry of Transport and the International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations (FIATA).
jlaMember.accreditation_text: JLA is the FIATA Association Member in Jordan, accredited to conduct a validated training programme leading to the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding.
jlaMember.regional_text: It is the only accredited member in Jordan to deliver this certified training, and one of the few accredited members in the Arab region.
jlaMember.partnership_text: Through this Diploma program, JLA and the National Sector Skills Council for Logistics (Logiskills) aim to bridge the skills gap in the logistics sector in Jordan and the region, better aligning labour market demands with workforce skills and supporting the country's economic development.
jlaMember.cta_title: Ready to Join a World-Class Program?
jlaMember.cta_description: Discover how JLA's FIATA-accredited training can advance your logistics career.

updates.update1_description: The latest edition of the FIATA Association Magazine featuring industry insights, policy updates, and global logistics trends. Stay informed about the latest developments in freight forwarding worldwide.
updates.update2_description: FIATA announces new guidelines for digital documentation and e-freight initiatives, aimed at streamlining international trade processes and reducing paper-based transactions.
updates.update3_title: Sustainability in Logistics: FIATA Green Initiative
updates.update3_description: New sustainability framework introduced for freight forwarders to measure and reduce carbon emissions across supply chain operations.
updates.update4_description: Industry report on the adoption of blockchain, AI, and IoT technologies in modern logistics operations and their impact on efficiency and transparency.
updates.update5_description: FIATA collaborates with WCO on initiatives to harmonize customs procedures and accelerate cross-border trade facilitation globally.
updates.update6_description: Latest amendments to IATA Dangerous Goods Regulations and their implications for air cargo operations and safety compliance.

mediaCentre.story1_text: "The FIATA Diploma opened doors I never thought possible. Within six months of completing the program, I was promoted to logistics manager at my company." - Alumni Testimonial

mediaCentre.story4_text: "The program's focus on real-world case studies meant I could immediately apply what I learned in my daily work. The impact was immediate." - Alumni Testimonial

diplomaHolders.intro: This page displays lists of graduates who have successfully completed the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding in Jordan. These professionals have demonstrated their commitment to excellence in logistics and freight forwarding.

diplomaHolders.cta_description: Become a FIATA Diploma holder and join the ranks of qualified logistics professionals in Jordan.

experts.intro: Our FIATA Diploma program is delivered by highly experienced logistics and freight forwarding professionals who have been validated by FIATA. Each instructor brings decades of real-world experience and a passion for developing the next generation of logistics experts.
experts.expert1_bio: Hassan Al Shaar is a seasoned logistics and freight forwarding expert with over 20 years of experience in the industry. He has been validated by FIATA as a certified instructor and has trained hundreds of professionals across the Middle East region.
experts.expert2_bio: Nizar Haddadin brings extensive knowledge in international trade compliance and customs procedures. With a career spanning multiple continents, he provides invaluable insights into global logistics operations and regulatory frameworks.
experts.expert3_bio: Osama Al-Zu'bi specializes in supply chain optimization and multimodal transport solutions. His practical approach to teaching combines theoretical knowledge with real-world case studies from his extensive industry experience.
experts.expert4_bio: Ramy Kawar is an expert in air cargo operations and dangerous goods handling. His specialized knowledge in aviation logistics and safety compliance makes him a valuable resource for understanding complex regulatory requirements.
experts.expert5_bio: Nabile Barakat has deep expertise in maritime shipping and containerized cargo operations. With decades of hands-on experience in port operations and ocean freight, he brings practical insights to complex shipping scenarios.
experts.expert6_bio: Marwan Banat specializes in cargo insurance, risk management, and freight documentation. His comprehensive understanding of legal frameworks and insurance principles helps students navigate the complex world of liability and claims.
experts.expert7_bio: Mohammad Alag is an authority on digital transformation in logistics and emerging technologies. He helps students understand how automation, blockchain, and digital platforms are reshaping the freight forwarding industry.
experts.expert8_bio: Abdullah Joubor brings expertise in land transport operations and cross-border logistics. His knowledge of regional trade corridors and transport infrastructure is invaluable for understanding overland freight movements in the Middle East.
experts.cta_description: Join our FIATA Diploma program and benefit from the expertise of these industry-leading professionals.

faqs.hero_subtitle: Everything you need to know about the FIATA Diploma Program
faqs.faq1_question: What is the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding?
faqs.faq1_answer: The FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding is an internationally recognised qualification awarded by the International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations (FIATA). It covers the essential principles of freight forwarding, international transport, customs procedures, and supply chain management. The program is designed to equip professionals with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in the global logistics industry.
faqs.faq2_question: Who can apply for the JLA FIATA Diploma program?
faqs.faq2_answer: The program is open to fresh graduates seeking to enter the logistics sector, freight forwarders and logistics professionals, customs clearance officers and transport officials, and owners and managers of small and medium-sized enterprises in the logistics sector. Applicants must have a secondary education certificate or equivalent and competence in the English language.
faqs.faq3_answer: The training is delivered face-to-face in Amman, Jordan, at a certified training venue that meets international standards for professional education.
faqs.faq4_question: What topics are covered in the program?
faqs.faq4_answer: The program covers a comprehensive curriculum including Introduction to Freight Forwarding and Logistics Services, Land, Sea, Air, and Rail Transportation, Supply Chain Management and Logistics Services, Customs Procedures and Clearance, Shipping Documents and International Trade, and Cargo Insurance and Risk Management. The training is delivered by FIATA-validated instructors using FIATA-approved materials.
faqs.faq5_question: What is the cost of the program?
faqs.faq5_answer: The program fee includes enrollment fees, training materials, certification upon completion, and daily refreshments during the training course. For specific fee information, please contact the Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA) at +962-6-5658094 or fiata@jla.jo. Special discounts are available for group enrollments and JLA members.
faqs.faq6_question: Is there financial aid or installment payment available?
faqs.faq6_answer: Yes, flexible payment options are available, allowing participants to pay in installments. Additionally, special discounts are offered for group enrollments and members of the Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA). Please contact JLA for more details about payment plans and discounts.
faqs.faq7_answer: To apply for the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding, please complete the application form and email it to fiata@jla.jo. You can also contact JLA directly at +962-6-5658094 or via WhatsApp at +962-793555761 for assistance with the application process.
faqs.faq8_answer: The Selection Committee reserves the right to interview candidates to validate the coherence of their professional background, qualifications, and motivation for pursuing the FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding. This ensures that applicants' profiles align with the programme's selection criteria and objectives.
faqs.faq9_answer: The program includes continuous assessment through case studies, practical assignments, and a final examination. The assessment is designed to evaluate both theoretical knowledge and practical application of freight forwarding principles. All assessments align with FIATA's international standards.
faqs.faq10_question: What if I miss classes or need to withdraw?
faqs.faq10_answer: Attendance is important for successful completion of the program. If you need to miss classes due to unforeseen circumstances, please contact the program coordinator as soon as possible. The JLA team will work with you to address any attendance issues. For withdrawal procedures and policies, please contact JLA directly at fiata@jla.jo.
faqs.faq11_question: Can I retake the final exam if I fail?
faqs.faq11_answer: Yes, retake opportunities are available for candidates who do not pass the final examination on their first attempt. Additional fees may apply for exam retakes. Please contact JLA for specific policies and procedures regarding exam retakes.
faqs.faq12_answer: Upon successful completion of the program, graduates will receive a FIATA Diploma in Freight Forwarding signed by the FIATA President and FIATA Director General. The certificate includes the title of the diploma, diploma number, name of the graduate, and date and place of issuance. This internationally recognized qualification demonstrates your professional competence in freight forwarding.
faqs.faq13_question: What are the benefits of joining the program?
faqs.faq13_answer: The program offers numerous benefits including internationally recognized certification that opens doors to global career opportunities, comprehensive knowledge of freight forwarding and logistics operations, networking opportunities with industry professionals, training from FIATA-validated instructors, practical skills applicable in real-world scenarios, enhanced career prospects and professional credibility, and alignment with international standards recognized by logistics companies worldwide.
faqs.faq14_answer: Yes, the FIATA Diploma program delivered by JLA is designed to be inclusive and accessible to all qualified candidates regardless of background. We welcome applications from diverse professionals who meet the admission requirements and are committed to pursuing excellence in freight forwarding and logistics.
faqs.faq15_question: How can I contact JLA for more details?
faqs.faq15_answer: You can contact the Jordanian Logistics Association (JLA) through multiple channels: Phone: +962-6-5658094, WhatsApp: +962-793555761, Email: fiata@jla.jo, Website: www.JLAFIATA.jo, or visit the office at Shmeissani, Yousef Bin Tashfeen Str., Bldg.18, P.O Box 941329 Amman 11194, Jordan. The JLA team is ready to answer your questions and assist with your application.
faqs.cta_description: Our team is here to help. Contact us for personalized assistance with your application.
